title: Fort Monroe National Monument: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       Fees There is no admission fee to visit Fort Monroe National Monument. Enjoy the fort, grounds, and beach areas at Fort Monroe. While visiting the park be sure to visit the Casemate Museum as well. The Casemate Museum is operated by the Commonwealth of Virginia with curatorial support provided by the US Army. Individual admission to the Casemate Museum is free. Group tours for pre-formed groups of 10 or more (and school groups Grade 3 and above) with a fee of $3.00 per person, please allow a two week notice when scheduling. Call 757-788-5591 for reservations.  Passes America the Beautiful  The National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass Series Since Fort Monroe National Monument is a free park, we do not carry the America the Beautiful passes for purchase.To learn more about the America the Beautiful pass series or make a purchase online click here. The nearest park where the America the Beautiful passes are available for purchase in-person is Colonial National Historical Park.
